scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev"
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd frontend && npm run lint:fix && cd ../backend && npm run lint:fix
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd frontend && npm run clean && cd ../backend && npm run clean
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules
scripts.install:all: npm ci && cd frontend && npm ci && cd ../backend && npm ci
scripts.install:prod: npm ci --only=production && cd frontend && npm ci --only=production
